short_description: SQL/MR function to predict if two objects are match or un-match using a Fellegi-Sunter model
long_description: SQL/MR function to predict if two objects are match or un-match using a Fellegi-Sunter model

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains the object pairs to be compared.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains the object pairs to be compared.

input_tables.name: model
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains the model learned by FellegiSunterTrainer.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains the model learned by FellegiSunterTrainer.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of input table columns to be copied to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of input table columns to be copied to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: SequenceInputBy
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LIST_VECTOR of column(s) that uniquely identifies each row of the input argument INPUT_ARG_NAME. The argument is used to ensure deterministic results for functions which produce results that vary from run to run.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input column(s) that uniquely identify each row of input table. The format is 'input1:c1' where input1 refers to the alias used by the input table that contains such column named c1.
